articles.title: Is recovery from stroke worse if you have genes linked to increased risk of smoking? - EurekAlert
articles.description: A genetic predisposition for smoking increases a person’s risk of worse recovery from an ischemic stroke, according to a study published in the September 21, 2022, online issue of Neurology®, the medical journal of the American Academy of Neurology. An ischem…
articles.content:

articles.title: NASA astronaut, Russian cosmonauts launch to space - CNN
articles.description:
A Russian capsule took an American to space today, marking a notable continuation of the Russian-US partnership in space in an era of great geopolitical tension.
The spacecraft took off from the famed Baikonur Cosmodrome in Kazakhstan, carrying NASA astronaut…

articles.author: © AFP 2022
articles.title: American, Russians to blast off for ISS as war rages in Ukraine - Briefly
articles.description: A US astronaut and two Russian cosmonauts are set to blast off to the International Space Station Wednesday on a Russian-operated flight despite soaring tensions between Moscow and Washington over Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content:
NASA astronaut Frank Rubio (L), and Russian cosmonauts Sergey Prokopyev and Dmitri Petelin, are set to blast off to the International Space Station (ISS).
Photo: Dmitry LOVETSKY / POOL/AFPSource: AF… [+3575 chars]

articles.title: America's Sexually Transmitted Disease Problem Is 'Out of Control' - Gizmodo
articles.description: At a conference this week, public health experts and health officials sounded an alarm over growing case numbers of syphilis, gonorrhea, and chlamydia.
articles.content: Sexually transmitted diseases in the U.S. are at a crisis point. On Monday, prominent public health experts and government officials raised an alarm over the ongoing annual rise in STDs. Preliminary … [+3650 chars]
